definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Lin2 ye4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: Greater Khingan Range forestry group, the central government subsidy of $55%.
sentences.chinese: 对大兴安岭林业集团公司，中央财政补贴55%。

sentences.english: Slope orchard in arid area is the main forestry manage model on Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 坡地旱作果园是我国黄土区坡面主要农林业经营形式。

sentences.english: Study on Agricultural Socialized Service System in the Process of Building New Socialist Countrysides;
sentences.chinese: 社会化服务体系建设是发展非公有制林业的基本保障。

sentences.english: It is emergent task to strengthen the management and tending of cultures in China forests.
sentences.chinese: 加强中幼龄林抚育管理已是我国林业的紧迫任务。

sentences.english: Morale in the Forest Department is at an all time low.
sentences.chinese: 林业部门的士气一直很低。

sentences.english: Sino-Forest hasn't said whether they plan to go to court.
sentences.chinese: 嘉汉林业还未表示他们是否计划诉诸法庭。

sentences.english: The traditional forestry shadow is desalinating day by day.
sentences.chinese: 传统林业的影子正在日趋淡化。

sentences.english: The collective forest right system reform is one of important contents for modern forestry construction.
sentences.chinese: 集体林权制度改革是现代林业建设的一项重要内容。

sentences.english: Both forestry ecology construction and development need public finance support.
sentences.chinese: 林业生态建设和发展需要公共财政的支持。

sentences.english: In the past, forestry in China was taken as a basic industry of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 过去中国林业曾经被定位为国民经济的基础产业。

sentences.english: The global gross value-added in the forestry sector is US$ 468 billion.
sentences.chinese: 全球林业部门增值总量为4680亿美元。

sentences.english: To promote modern forestry construction has been the topic for Chinese forestry development.
sentences.chinese: 推进现代林业建设，已成为中国林业发展的主题。

sentences.english: To promote modern forestry construction has been the topic for Chinese forestry development.
sentences.chinese: 推进现代林业建设，已成为中国林业发展的主题。

sentences.english: Agroforestry systems research and development in the Asia and Pacific Region.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及太平洋区域农区林业系统研究和发展。

sentences.english: Forest farmers are participants of ecological environmental construction and forestry industrial development.
sentences.chinese: 林农是林业生态环境建设的最直接参与者和建设者。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the meaning of agroforestry.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了农用林业的含义。
